name: Changes (itch) (etalgames)
description:
Changes is a puzzle game where you push cells to reshape the world and discover wonderful transformations. All the puzzles emerge from three simple rules which come together to tell stories; some tragic, others epic, and a few are pretty cute.

  • Solve over 100 thoughtfully designed levels which teach you about the system.
  • Explore 8 worlds, each showcasing unique aspects of the system.
  • No gated areas or hidden levels. Everything is unlocked for you to explore.
  • Dynamic music that responds to your actions.

Even failure can produce beautiful results.
